Title: Chakkara Maavin Kombathu
Actors: Gourav Menon, Joy Mathew, Harisree Asokan, Meera Vasudevan
Plot: Uthaman and Jentry have a troubled childhood, whilst the former who comes from a very poor family, the latter yearns for parental love. The story takes a twist when Uthaman's father tells him that Aalimammookka has many treasures.
